    • check

      public static boolean check(Board[][] board, int kingi, int kingj)
      Checks if King at provided position is in Check.
      Parameters:
      board - the chess board as a 2D array of Board objects
      kingi - the initial column index of the king on the board
      kingj - the initial row index of the king on the board
      Returns:
      true if the King is at Check at provided position, false otherwise

    • reachHere

      public static boolean reachHere(Board[][] board, int finali, int finalj, String color)
      This method checks if any of the key of the provided color except King can be validly moved to the provided position This is a helper function to CheckMate method. It helps in the following ways: It checks if the provided position is safe for the King or not It also checks if the check giving Knight can be killed. It also helps to see if any other key can be placed in between the check.
      Parameters:
      board - the chess board as a 2D array of Board objects
      finali - the final column index intended to reach on the board
      finalj - the final row index intended to reach on the board
      Returns:
      true if the any key of provided color except King can be validly moved to provided position, false otherwise

    • checkMate

      public static boolean checkMate(Board[][] board, int kingi, int kingj)
      Checks if King at provided position is CheckMated.
      Parameters:
      board - the chess board as a 2D array of Board objects
      kingi - the initial column index of the king on the board
      kingj - the initial row index of the king on the board
      Returns:
      true if the King is CheckMated at provided position, false otherwise
